mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.abbr AS "abbr", a.account AS "account", a.password AS "password", a.monthcode AS "monthcode", a.sendsite AS "sendsite", a.templatesize AS "templatesize", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pool_express a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.abbr LIKE '%'||#{abbr}||'%' '%'+#{abbr}+'%' concat('%',#{abbr},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pool_express( id, name, abbr, account, password, monthcode, sendsite, templatesize, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{abbr}, #{account}, #{password}, #{monthcode}, #{sendsite}, #{templatesize}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pool_express SET name = #{name}, abbr = #{abbr}, account = #{account}, password = #{password}, monthcode = #{monthcode}, sendsite = #{sendsite}, templatesize = #{templatesize}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
